cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the eastern Caribbean Sea toward the southern coast of Hispaniola, then near Jamaica and eastern Cuba

weather_observation.watch_coast: Grenada and its dependencies; Saba and Sint Eustatius; Jamaica; Dominica
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings for Barbados, St. Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines; Tropical-storm warnings for Martinique, entire coast of Haiti, and the southern coast of the Dominican Republic from Cabo Engano to the Haiti border
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands, southern Leeward Islands, Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands, southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, eastern Cuba
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤14%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; brief gusts possible late Friday into early Saturday
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain with isolated 5-inch pockets possible; minor flooding or mudslides cannot be ruled out
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and dangerous rip currents in surrounding waters are likely during the passage
